metadata.title: CVE-2012-5650 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the Futon UI in Apache CouchDBbefore 1.0.4, 1.1.x before 1.1.2, and 1.2.x before 1.2.1 allows remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified parametersto the browser-based test suite.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-5650` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

couchdb - 1.2.0-5ubuntu1
couchdb-bin - 1.2.0-5ubuntu1
couchdb-common - 1.2.0-5ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: couchdb package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-5ubuntu1').
